content: The plots pop up on the console plots tab instead of a different screen, and because of this I can't click the buttons
subject: Plot's appearing but buttons not working

content:
Did you set the "Graphics backend" setting in Spyder?

===

NOTE: Additional setup if using Spyder

This problem set involves making interactive plots. If you are using Spyder, plots typically appear in the Plots pane and are not interactive.

To be able to interact with your plots in Spyder, go to Preferences | IPython console | Graphics. Under Graphics Backend, change the backend to Automatic. This will open any generated plots in a new window, allowing you to interact with them as intended in this pset.
